test_cases.Title: Verify ticket details are displayed correctly for a service request
test_cases.Description: Ensure that the ticket details such as request number, title, status, due date, approval status, quantity, and stage are displayed accurately on the request details page.
test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged into the HPNow portal and has navigated to a specific service request details page.
TestSteps: Select a service request from the list.
test_cases.ExpectedResult: The request number, title, status, due date, approval status, quantity, and stage are displayed correctly as per the selected request.

test_cases.Title: Verify workflow progress bar displays correct stages and statuses
test_cases.Description: Check that the workflow progress bar shows all relevant stages with their respective statuses (e.g., Approved, Completed, In Progress, Pending) for the selected request.
test_cases.Preconditions: User is on the request details page for a service request with multiple workflow stages.
TestSteps: Open a service request with workflow stages.
test_cases.ExpectedResult: All workflow stages are displayed with correct labels and statuses (e.g., checkmarks for completed, in progress, pending).

test_cases.Title: Verify Cancel button is visible and enabled for open requests
test_cases.Description: Ensure that the Cancel button is displayed and enabled when the request status is 'Open'.
test_cases.Preconditions: User is viewing a service request with status 'Open'.
TestSteps: Open a service request with status 'Open'.
Check for the presence and state of the Cancel button.
test_cases.ExpectedResult: The Cancel button is visible and enabled for open requests.

test_cases.Title: Verify activity stream displays request creation event
test_cases.Description: Check that the activity stream shows the creation event of the request with the correct user and timestamp.
test_cases.Preconditions: User is on the request details page.
TestSteps: Scroll to the activity stream section.
test_cases.ExpectedResult: The activity stream displays the request creation event with the correct user and timestamp.

test_cases.Title: Verify navigation sidebar is present with all expected icons
test_cases.Description: Ensure that the left navigation sidebar is visible and contains icons for home, tickets, search, and other expected navigation options.
test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged into the HPNow portal.
test_cases.ExpectedResult: The navigation sidebar is present and displays all expected navigation icons.

test_cases.Title: Verify top bar displays search, My Items, My Favorites, and user profile options
test_cases.Description: Check that the top bar contains the search field, My Items, My Favorites, and user profile options.
test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged into the HPNow portal.
TestSteps: Verify the presence of search, My Items, My Favorites, and user profile options.
test_cases.ExpectedResult: The top bar displays search, My Items, My Favorites, and user profile options.
